title: shree rangashaayinam
sahitya:
shrIrangashAyinam sakala shubhadAyinam cintayEham sadA hrdayE
kAruNya saushIlya shaurya vAtsalyAdi kalyAna guNa jalanidhim- dEvadEvam

caraNam 1

kSira sAgara samutthita vimAnAntaram shrI bhUsatI bhAsitam
suribrnda sunanda nanda jaya vijayAdi bhUri parijana sEvitam
cAraNOraga siddha sAdhya gandharva gaNa sanakAdi muni sannutam
sArasOdbhava mukha amara pAlana prApta satya lOkAdi vasitam- dEvadEvam

caraNam 2

paramabhaktOkSavAku mahita puNya vishESa dharaNItala samAgatam
sarayU nadItIra viracita hiraNmayAvaraNa suvimAnasthitam
guru tapOnidhi vasiSThAdi samyami sumandira parivESTitam
taraNi kula dhanya mUrdhanyAdi santata krtOtsava shObhitam-dEvadEvam

caraNam 3

nirupamakavErajA sukrtata atishaya danujavara vibhISaNa vashAgatam
cirakAla krtavAsa muni sAndracandra puSkaraNI taTasusthitam
vara dharmava varma nirmita bharmamaya saptava prAntara virAjitam
surasEvyamAna kOsalapurIshvaram akhila naralOka paripUjitam- dEvadEvam
